long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover "SummarAIzer" - The Ultimate Multilingual Article Summarizer! Our Chrome extension, powered by OpenAI's advanced GPT technology, is here to revolutionize your online reading experience. With a single click, SummarAIzer effortlessly transforms any article into a clear, concise summary in any language. Stay informed and save time, regardless of the content or language you encounter. 

** Important : You will need to provide your own Open AI API Key in order to use this extension **
